text: Soni nkalombela (jenumanja Asilamu ŵachilume) achakongwe ŵagalagatila isanamu mpaka ali akulupilile, chisimu kapolo jwachikongwe jwakulupilila juŵele jwambone kumpunda (nnukosyo) jwagalagatila isanamu atamuno juli junnonyelesye. Nombe soni (Asilamu ŵachikongwe) nkaalombekasya ku achalume ŵagalagatila isanamu mpaka ali akulupilile, chisimu kapolo jwachilume jwakulupilila juŵele jwambone kumpunda (nnukosyo) jwagalagatila isanamu atamuno juli junnonyelesye. Ŵanganyao akuŵilanjila ku Moto, nambo Allah akuŵilanjila ku Mbepo ni chikululuko mwa lisosa Lyakwe, ni akusalichisyaga ma Ȃya Gakwe ku ŵandu kuti aŵe ŵakumbuchila
